item.title: Flight Departure Delay Prediction
item.description: Obtained the dataset and converted date, month and year columns into date-time object, then into single date column. Encoded Airport and Airline names into numerical labels for easier analysis. Scraped weather data from www.wunderground.com (Weather Underground) and integrated into the flight delay dataset. Split Departure Delay column into 4 bins based on the amount of delay and predicted it using Random Forest, Logistic Regression, Decision Tree and Na√Øve Bayes from Scikit-learn library.
